parallel.distributed

Class DRecvMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DRecvMsg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DMsgIntf

    public class DRecvMsg
extends java.lang.Object
implements DMsgIntf
    implements a wrapper object for a "recvData()" request from a (local/remote) thread that is transmitted via the socket wire to the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv. Not for use as part of the public API (despite the "public" status).

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      DRecvMsg(int myid, int fromid, java.lang.String coordName)
      wraps a recvData(myid, fromid) request -i.e.
      DRecvMsg(int myid, java.lang.String coordName)
      wraps a recvData(myid) request -i.e.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      reads the data and sends them back to the JVM's thread that connected to the server, via the same socket.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DRecvMsg

        public DRecvMsg(int myid,
        java.lang.String coordName)
        wraps a recvData(myid) request -i.e. don't care who the sender is.
        Parameters:
        myid - int id of the thread requesting to receive some data.
        coordName - String name of the coordinator to be used by the server.

      • DRecvMsg

        public DRecvMsg(int myid,
        int fromid,
        java.lang.String coordName)
        wraps a recvData(myid, fromid) request -i.e. only accept data from a sender who declared their tid is fromid.
        Parameters:
        myid - int id of the thread requesting to receive data.
        fromid - int declared id of the thread from which the thread with declared id=myid is interested in receiving data only.
        coordName - String name of the coordinator to be used by the server.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
             throws ParallelException,
                    java.io.IOException
        reads the data and sends them back to the JVM's thread that connected to the server, via the same socket.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface DMsgIntf
        Parameters:
        oos - ObjectOutputStream
        Throws:
        ParallelException
        java.io.IOException
